text: "Paradise" is a song by American singer Bazzi, released as a single on April 4, 2019. The music video was released the same day. The song reached the top 50 in Australia and the top 40 in Norway. It is the lead single from his debut mixtape Soul Searching. ==Critical reception== Chloe Gilke of Uproxx called the song a "pop anthem" and "blissfully romantic". Madeline Roth of MTV said "Paradise" is a "fittingly euphoric anthem in the vein of his previous hits 'Mine' and 'Beautiful'". ==Music video== The music video was released on April 5, 2019.
